title: STEM+C Learning Engagement Design Through [K-12] Smart Greenhouse Projects

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental programming concepts and understanding of plant growth conditions
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in BYOD environments, focusing on technology application cases linked to social issues

learning_goals: Learners can explain a three-step or more sensor data collection and analysis process for designing a smart greenhouse system.
Learners can implement a plant growth environment automatic control algorithm using Python-based microcontroller code
Learners can propose at least two ways in which STEM+C technologies contribute to solving social problems based on project outcomes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
